g.text: FREE & OPEN SOURCE CLAUDE CODE PLUGIN
ADD is coordinated agent swarms -- test-writers, implementers, reviewers, deployers --
that ship verified software as a team. Spec-driven. Test-first. Independently verified.
You've done TDD and BDD. Now ADD something to your development.
Different agent / Fresh context / Humans validate UX via screenshots
output. Fresh context, no shared state.
You set the boundaries. Agents work within them.
Universal best practices for all users
